name.value: Pop! The Balloon Dog Puzzle Game

item.description:
Guide POP! past porcupines, thumbtacks, cats, bees, firecrackers, car batteries and more. Yikes! This deviously demented puzzle game features 87 levels of cartoon mayhem.

POP! is the original balloon dog challenge. Accept no imitations!

Over 86 crazy challenging puzzles! 
Fun for ages 6 to 61, 63 and up 
Cats! Bees! Thumbtacks! Firecrackers! and more! 
Runs great on a laptop! 
No Score! Just good clean fun! 
Infinite lives! Play 'til you Pop! 
Catchy original tunes! 
Realistic sound effects! 
Award-winning performances by porcupines! 
"Year 2000" ready! 
7 FREE jokes with every purchase!

Source: The Developer Website.


User Summary

You play as Pop, a balloon dog, trying to reach the Moon. The game consists of 87 levels where you jump from balloon to balloon, trying to reach a target star patterned balloon which will then rise to take you up to the next level.

Each level can include dangers that will cause Pop to burst, for example push pins, saw blades and cats (cats can be scared away by Pop barking). There are balloons which catapult Pop to another location on the level, firecrackers which cause sections of the level to burst, and if you jump in the wrong direction you will plummet to your doom.
